verses.roman:
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe anubhavi' ei dui-jana
saṅkṣepe bāhulye karena kaḍacā-granthana

synonyms: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe—moment by moment; anubhavi'-understanding; ei dui-jana—these two persons; saṅkṣepe—in brief; bāhulye—elaborately; karena—do; kaḍacā-granthana—compiling the notebooks.
translation: These two great personalities [Svarūpa Dāmodara and Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī] recorded the activities of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu moment by moment. They described these activities briefly as well as elaborately in their notebooks.

purport.content: For future reference, we should remember that Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī recorded the pastimes briefly, whereas Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī recorded them elaborately. These two great personalities simply recorded the facts; they did not create any descriptive literary embellishments.
